content: 23 chain 1 single_crochet 2 sts decrease repeat to end of round slip_stitch break off white round 24 variegated garnet attach garnet chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 8 sts total * begin nerve endings 1 enough thread to make more than one eyeball round 25 chain 1 1 single_crochet chain 21 3 single_crochet in second chain from hook 3 single_crochet in each chain as you work your way back down chain to round 25 2 single_crochet chain 31 repeat instructions in parentheses 2 single_crochet chain 16 repeat instructions in parentheses 2 single_crochet chain 21 repeat instructions in parentheses 1sc slip_stitch fasten_off finishing weave in ends using single strands of variegated garnet thread beginning at nerve ending base row embroider veins on white portion of eyeball using embroidery chain stitch i recommend the embroiderers guild website for detailed directions on embroidery chain stitch http //www embroiderersguild com/stitch/stitches/chain html add as many veins as desired this pattern is the sole property of regina rioux gonzalez and may not be used for sale or distribution items made from this pattern are not to be used for sale or distribution copyright 2006 regina rioux gonzalez all rights reserved eyeball with nerve endings pattern page 2 finishing weave in ends using single strands of variegated garnet thread beginning at nerve ending base row embroider veins on white portion of eyeball using embroidery chain stitch add as many veins as desired copyright 2005 regina rioux gonzalez all rights reserved
